TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can be casted even after another spell has been casted this turn by the same caster
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can be casted even after another spell has been casted this turn by the same caster
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann sogar gewirkt werden, wenn der Zaubernde diesen Zug schon einen anderen Zauber gewirkt hat
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Can be casted even after another spell has been casted this turn by the same caster
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Can be casted even after another spell has been casted this turn by the same caster

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the population of the city by %d1
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the population of the city by %d1
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the population of the city by %d1
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Aumenta la población de la ciudad por %d1

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Reduces the population of the city by %d1
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Reduces the population of the city by %d1
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Reduces the population of the city by %d1
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Reduce la población de la ciudad por %d1
